subject: Displaying test case information during execution.

messageBody:
I apologize if this is a repeat questions. I did some searching in
the message archive but couldn't find the answer to my question.

History: I'm running a test suite which has some test cases from with
in a servlet.

Question: I want to be able to display

1. TestCase name
2. TestCase method name

during execution of each method of every test case. How do I
accomplish this ?

Thank You,
KJ.
